select count(*) from products where 1=1
and category = #{category}
and name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update products set cnt=cnt+1 where p_id=#{p_id}
update products set likey=likey+1 where p_id=#{p_id}
mapper.insert:
select concat('P',TO_NUMBER(substr(max(p_id),2))+1) from products
insert into products (p_id,name,category,price,stock,likey,cnt,script,tnImage,id) values (#{p_id},#{name},#{category},#{price},#{stock},0,0,#{script},#{tnImage},#{id})
mapper.select: select A.seq,A.p_id,B.name,B.price,B.tnImage,A.quantity from cart A join products B on A.p_id=B.p_id where A.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update cart set quantity = #{quantity} where seq = #{seq}
update products set stock=stock-#{qty} where p_id=#{p_id}
update products set stock=stock+#{qty} where p_id=#{p_id}
